name: Parslo
description:
Parslo is a small Unity title designed around the theme "Life after Death" for a 72hr Game Jam. It follows Parslo, a fledgling raven recently passed, as he travels aimlessly through Limbo to have his fate judged for the afterlife.

Controls
Mouse: Move Spirit Guide
Left-Shift: Amplify Heartbeats
Spacebar: Flap Parslo's Wings
